verses.name: Revelation 8:7
verses.text: The first angel sounded, and there followed hail and fire mingled with blood, and they were cast upon the earth: and the third part of trees was burnt up, and all green grass was burnt up.

verses.name: Revelation 8:8
verses.text: And the second angel sounded, and as it were a great mountain burning with fire was cast into the sea: and the third part of the sea became blood;

verses.name: Revelation 8:9
verses.text: And the third part of the creatures which were in the sea, and had life, died; and the third part of the ships were destroyed.
